sentences.en: And such an inhibition might necessitate de novo protein synthesis.
sentences.cn: 而这种抑制作用需要新的蛋白质合成.

sentences.en: Any delay in shipment will necessitate awkward explanation to the users.
sentences.cn: 延误装运将使我们难于向各用户解释.

sentences.en: Complications, however, could necessitate the removal of the implants.
sentences.cn: 然而, 并发症可能需要再次移走‘种植体’(直译).

sentences.en: Lack of money necessitated a change of plan.
sentences.cn: 由于缺乏资金，只能改变计划。

sentences.en: Moreover, sacrectomy may cause pelvic instability that may necessitate additional surgery.
sentences.cn: 而且, 骶骨切除引起的骨盆失稳,可能需要另外的手术.

sentences.en: Reassign personnel as work loads necessitate.
sentences.cn: 根据工作量的需要重新分配人员.

sentences.en: Starting an enterprise will necessitate borrowing money.
sentences.cn: 开创事业不得不去借入资金.

sentences.en: The agglomeration and sintering of fine particles can necessitate a lowering in temperature of operation.
sentences.cn: 由于微粒易于聚集和烧结,不得不降低操作温度.

sentences.en: The conversion will necessitate the complete rebuilding of the interior.
sentences.cn: 转变就必需完善内部重建.

sentences.en: The rapidity of and potential severity necessitate prompt diagnosis and treatment.
sentences.cn: 由于它的伤害大,必须早期诊断及治疗,以避免后遗症发生.

sentences.en: This change would necessitate starting all over again.
sentences.cn: 这一改变使全部不得不重来.

sentences.en: This may necessitate touching up your eye shadow a bit.
sentences.cn: 不过,辩刍可免地也会擦掉一点眼影.

sentences.en: This may necessitate transmitting and receiving signals in different frequency bands.
sentences.cn: 这可能使在不同频段内发射及接收信号成为必要的.

sentences.en: To map 100 mutants by this method would necessitate nearly 5,000 crosses.
sentences.cn: 用这种方法来绘制100个突变型的遗传图就要做5000个杂交.

sentences.en: Your mistakes necessitate doing the work again.
sentences.cn: 你的错误使你有必要把这工作重做一遍.

sentences.en: Your proposal will necessitate borrowing more money.
sentences.cn: 依你的建议就必须增加借款.

trans.tran_en: to make it necessary for you to do something

trans.tran_cn: 使…成为必要，需要，强迫，迫使
trans.tran_en: to make it necessary for you to do something
